document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a0ffc0">Adventure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">most </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c80ff">Soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c80ff">condemned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a0ffc0">Attended </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a0ffc0">single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">Hound </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a0ffc0">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">identity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
